title: Develop a Story from a Press Release
description: A reporter receives a press release about a new product. They must go beyond the release to write an original story.

tasks.description: Analyze the press release to understand the company's main claims.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the key marketing points from the release.

tasks.description: Find independent industry analysts or competitors to get an outside perspective on the announcement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds 2-3 sources who can provide context and a reality check.

tasks.description: Write a story that includes the company's announcement but also adds the context and analysis from independent sources.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a balanced and original news story, not just a rewrite of the press release.
